movie.title: Evilenko
movie.plot: For years, Andrei Evilenko eluded the obsessive Detective Lesiev and the psychiatric profiler Aron Richter. Spurred on by his rabid fury at the gradual crumbling of his precious Soviet Union, Evilenko is a man who will live, die and kill as a communist.

events.title: Andrei Chikatilo, who Andrej Romanovich Evilenko is based on, is arrested
